body: This series is one of the best H doujin of all time
I want MC to find someone to settle down with.
I don't get anything, Probably a multi work fuck again I ain't wasting my time. Good art tho..
@nhcasual - because the source posting was originally tagged poorly when it was ported over to this site.  Unfortunately it happens way too much.
Damn another banger.....art 10/10 and my detective nigga down to business in the streets. It's a wonderful day
Eh... multi-work tag needed so people know this is part of a series, what's with all of the H mangas missing tags recently?
